name: Allotrope Eclipse
blurb: When a civilian encounters strange and unexplainable situations, the question becomes, can they survive the unknown?

rewards.reward: The feeling of knowing you helped out an indie developer + Honorable Mention in game credits + Free Digital Copy of the game upon release.
